data: {"adult":false,"backdrop_path":"/ki5i4vy1mjnEB7u8Azhi8mQxlKA.jpg","belongs_to_collection":null,"budget":0,"genres":[{"id":35,"name":"Comedy"},{"id":18,"name":"Drama"},{"id":10749,"name":"Romance"}],"homepage":"","id":4254,"imdb_id":"tt0347304","origin_country":["IN"],"original_language":"hi","original_title":"कल हो ना हो","overview":"An uptight MBA student falls for the charismatic new neighbor who charms her troubled family – but he has a secret that forces him to push her away.","popularity":13.911,"poster_path":"/zhMI6I0kSLnewTMwE0A8Tz3Cj2f.jpg","production_companies":[{"id":19146,"logo_path":"/5Ff25ornzVNhm5skuAvMAR556NB.png","name":"Dharma Productions","origin_country":"IN"}],"production_countries":[{"iso_3166_1":"IN","name":"India"}],"release_date":"2003-11-27","revenue":0,"runtime":187,"spoken_languages":[{"english_name":"Hindi","iso_639_1":"hi","name":"हिन्दी"},{"english_name":"English","iso_639_1":"en","name":"English"}],"status":"Released","tagline":"A story of a lifetime… in a heartbeat.","title":"Kal Ho Naa Ho","video":false,"vote_average":7.5,"vote_count":369}
